name: Galactic Duo
description:
Controls

Arrow keys to move
F to change characters
E to collect items and interact with certain objects
T to enter UFO when level objectives are complete
P to use superpower (Charlie can toggle between a light sphere and a heavy cube (the  cube can activate switches). Dave has the power to break boulders.) 
In boss battles, SPACE to fire bombs if you have collected them

STORY:

Two aliens, Charlie and Dave, have crash landed on an unknown planet. Desperate to return home, they must fix their wrecked spaceship. But the ship doesn't have enough fuel to make it home in one go, so they must stop off at other planets along the way to collect power gems, which fuel their spaceship. They must also fight monsters along the way. Only teamwork can save them now.
